etymology.interpretation: Sketches the side view of a human ear: the vertical stroke outlines the rim while shorter strokes suggest inner folds. Early forms were more curved and naturalistic; later writing regularized the lines but the image remains recognizable.

examples.chinese: 戴上耳机(戴上耳機)，听音乐(聽音樂)。
examples.english: Put on headphones and listen to music.

examples.chinese: 医生检查他的左耳(醫生檢查他的左耳)。
examples.pinyin: Yīshēng jiǎnchá tā de zuǒ ěr.
examples.english: The doctor examined his left ear.
